column2: International Day of the Air traffic Controller

column6: Bearing = arctan2(X, Y); X = cos(phi_2) * sin(Delta_lambda); Y = cos(phi_1) * sin(phi_2) - sin(phi_1) * cos(phi_2) * cos(Delta_lambda); Delta_lambda = lambda_2 - lambda_1

column5: Coordinates of a Point Given Distance and Bearing
column6: phi_2 = arcsin(sin(phi_1) * cos(d/R) + cos(phi_1) * sin(d/R) * cos(theta)); lambda_2 = lambda_1 + arctan2(sin(theta) * sin(d/R) * cos(phi_1), cos(d/R) - sin(phi_1) * sin(phi_2))
